productDetail.consultationDescription: Our specialists will help you choose the optimal solution for your tasks

cementirovanie.title: Cementing Units
cementirovanie.description: Design and manufacturing of mobile cementing installations
cementirovanie.fullDescription: We specialize in the design, manufacturing, and supply of modern cementing units for the oil and gas industry. Our equipment meets the highest quality and reliability standards, ensuring efficient well cementing operations in any climatic conditions.
benefits: Use of components from leading global manufacturers
Proprietary control system in manual and automatic modes
Operation capability at temperatures from -45°C to +50°C
Quick payback due to high reliability

whyUs: Over 15 years of experience in oil and gas engineering

grp.title: Fracturing Equipment
grp.fullDescription: We provide a complete set of equipment for hydraulic fracturing operations. Our units are equipped with modern control and monitoring systems, ensuring maximum efficiency and safety of the process. We work with both new equipment and modernization of existing ones.
benefits: Continuous monitoring of all process parameters
Compatibility with various types of proppant and fluids

whyUs: Full service maintenance throughout the service life

nasosnoe.title: Pumping Equipment
nasosnoe.description: Supply and modernization of pumping units
nasosnoe.fullDescription: We supply a wide range of high-pressure pumping equipment for the oil and gas industry. We work directly with leading manufacturers, which allows us to offer competitive prices while maintaining high quality. We also carry out modernization and overhaul of existing equipment.
benefits: Wide range of pumps of various capacities
Availability of spare parts in stock

process.title: Requirements determination
process.description: Analysis of technical requirements and operating conditions

process.title: Equipment selection
process.description: Selection of optimal pumping equipment for the task

modernizaciya.title: Modernization and Repair
modernizaciya.fullDescription: We provide services for overhaul and modernization of oil and gas equipment. Our experience allows us to significantly extend the service life of equipment, improve its technical characteristics and reduce operating costs. We work with equipment from any manufacturers.
benefits: Replacement of worn units and assemblies
Modernization of control and automation systems

process.description: Preparation of repair and modernization plan with cost calculation

process.description: Repair and modernization according to the approved plan

process.description: Control tests and equipment handover to the customer

whyUs: Experience working with equipment from various manufacturers

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: This site uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. By continuing to use the site, you agree to our

intro.text: By joining this Agreement and providing your data on the medved-neftegaz.ru Website (hereinafter referred to as the Website), by filling out the form fields, the User:
items: confirms that all data specified by them belongs personally to them;

confirms and acknowledges that they have carefully read the Agreement and the terms of processing their personal data specified in the form fields (registration) in full, the text of the agreement and the terms of personal data processing are clear to them;

gives consent to the Website to process the personal data provided as part of the information for the purpose of concluding this Agreement between them and the Website, as well as its subsequent execution;
gives consent to the transfer of their personal data;
expresses consent to the terms of personal data processing.

owner.title: Website Owner
owner.content: The owner of the medved-neftegaz.ru website is Limited Liability Company "Trading House "Medved"
owner.address: Address: 107031, Moscow, INT.TER.C. Tverskoy Municipal District, Bolshaya Dmitrovka St., Building 32, Structure 9, Room 3

consent.title: Consent to Personal Data Processing
consent.content: The User gives their consent to the processing of their personal data, namely the performance of actions provided for in paragraph 3 of part 1 of Article 3 of Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 "On Personal Data", and confirms that by giving such consent, they act freely, of their own will and in their own interest.
consent.details: The User's consent to the processing of personal data is specific, informed and conscious.
consent.form: This consent of the User is considered executed in simple written form for the processing of the following personal data:

operations.title: Operations with Personal Data
operations.content: The User provides medved-neftegaz.ru with the right to perform the following actions (operations) with personal data: collection and accumulation; storage for the periods established by regulatory documents for storage of reports, but not less than three years from the date of termination of the User's use of services; clarification (update, change); use; destruction; depersonalization; transfer at the request of the court, including to third parties, in compliance with measures ensuring the protection of personal data from unauthorized access.

duration.title: Duration of Consent
duration.content: This consent is valid indefinitely from the moment of providing the data and can be revoked by you by submitting an application to the website administration with the data specified in Article 14 of the Law "On Personal Data".
duration.withdrawal: Withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data can be carried out by the User sending a corresponding order in simple written form to the email address info@aomedved.ru

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: The Website is not responsible for the use (both lawful and unlawful) by third parties of Information posted by the User on the Website, including its reproduction and distribution, carried out in all possible ways.

changes.title: Changes to the Agreement
changes.content: The Website has the right to make changes to this Agreement. When making changes, the date of the last update is indicated in the current version. The new version of the Agreement comes into force from the moment of its posting, unless otherwise provided by the new version of the Agreement.
changes.location: The current version of the Agreement is located on the page at: https://medved-neftegaz.ru/privacy-policy

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.content: This Consent is recognized by me as my written consent to the processing of my personal data, given in accordance with Article 9 of Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 "On Personal Data".
confirmation.dataSubject: By this Consent, I confirm that I am the subject of the personal data provided, and also confirm the accuracy of the data provided.
confirmation.awareness: I am aware that registering and/or submitting a request to receive an offer and/or subscribing to receive advertising information on the Website means my written consent to the terms described in this Consent.

operator.title: 1. Personal Data Operator
operator.content: The personal data operator is TD Medved JSC (hereinafter referred to as the Operator), which processes users' personal data in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 "On Personal Data".

purposes.title: 2. Purposes of Personal Data Processing
purposes.content: The Operator processes personal data for the following purposes:
items: Providing information about company services and products
Processing user requests and inquiries
Conclusion and execution of contracts
Informing about new services and special offers
Conducting statistical and other research

legal.title: 3. Legal Grounds for Processing
legal.content: Personal data processing is carried out on the basis of:
items: Consent of the personal data subject
Contract to which the personal data subject is a party
Legislation of the Russian Federation

categories.title: 4. Categories of Processed Data
categories.content: The Operator processes the following categories of personal data:
items: Last name, first name, patronymic
Contact information (email address, phone number)
Position and organization name
Website usage data

methods.title: 5. Processing Methods
methods.content: Personal data processing is carried out using automation tools and without such tools. The Operator applies the following processing methods:
items: Collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage
Clarification (updating, modification)
Extraction, use, transfer (provision, access)
Depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction

period.title: 6. Personal Data Processing Period
period.content: Personal data is processed for the period necessary to achieve processing purposes, unless otherwise provided by law. After achieving processing purposes or upon withdrawal of consent, personal data is deleted or depersonalized.

rights.title: 7. Rights of Personal Data Subjects
rights.content: The personal data subject has the right to:
items: Receive information regarding the processing of their personal data
Request clarification, blocking or destruction of personal data
Withdraw consent to personal data processing
Appeal the actions or inaction of the Operator to the authorized body
Protect their rights and legitimate interests, including compensation for damages

security.title: 8. Personal Data Protection Measures
security.content: The Operator takes necessary legal, organizational and technical measures to protect personal data from unlawful or accidental access, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, provision, distribution, as well as from other unlawful actions.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.address: Address: 107031, Moscow, VN.TER.G. Tverskoy Municipal District, Dmitrovka B. str., 32, building 9, room 3

tsementirovaniye.title: Cementing Equipment
tsementirovaniye.description: Mobile cementing units for well completion
tsementirovaniye.longDescription: Our cementing equipment consists of modern mobile units designed for quality completion of oil and gas wells. We use advanced technologies and components from leading global manufacturers, ensuring reliability and efficiency in the most challenging conditions.
features: Proprietary control system in manual and automatic modes

grp.title: Fracturing Equipment
grp.longDescription: Our hydraulic fracturing (HF) units are designed for oil and gas production intensification. The equipment creates fractures in the productive formation, significantly increasing rock permeability and substantially boosting well flow rates.
features: Fracturing fluid and proppant mixing system
applications: Repeat HF for flow rate recovery

nasos.title: Pumping Equipment
nasos.longDescription: Our pumping equipment consists of modern high-performance units designed for a wide range of tasks in the oil and gas industry. The units ensure reliable operation at high pressures and large volumes of pumped fluid.

cementirovochnyj-agregat.title: Cementing Unit CA-320
cementirovochnyj-agregat.fullDescription: The CA-320 cementing unit is modern high-tech equipment designed for cementing casing strings in oil and gas wells. The unit ensures reliable casing fixation and creation of a quality cement ring.
advantages: Operation capability in harsh climatic conditions

peredvizhnaya-nasosnaya.title: Mobile Pumping Station
peredvizhnaya-nasosnaya.description: Mobile high-pressure unit for flushing and fracturing
peredvizhnaya-nasosnaya.fullDescription: The mobile high-pressure pumping station is designed to perform a wide range of technological operations in the oil and gas industry. The unit provides working fluid supply under high pressure for various well treatment operations.

kompleks-grp.title: Fracturing Complex
kompleks-grp.fullDescription: The hydraulic fracturing complex is next-generation high-tech equipment equipped with modern automation and control systems. The complex is designed for oil and gas production intensification operations using hydraulic fracturing method.

mnogofunkcionalnaya-ustanovka.title: Multifunctional Unit
mnogofunkcionalnaya-ustanovka.description: Universal equipment for various technological operations
mnogofunkcionalnaya-ustanovka.fullDescription: The multifunctional unit is a universal solution for performing a wide range of technological operations in the oil and gas industry. The equipment combines the functionality of several specialized units, significantly improving work efficiency.

excellence.title: Manufacturing Output
excellence.description: Our solutions and effective technologies help clients achieve exceptional results in the oil and gas industry

technology.title: Technology Availability
technology.description: Modern equipment and advanced production technologies

flexibility.title: Solution Flexibility
flexibility.description: Individual approach to each project and task

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Fast order fulfillment and technical support

aboutSection.title: About Company
aboutSection.description: TD Medved is a leading manufacturer of equipment for the oil and gas industry. We specialize in the design and manufacture of cementing units, hydraulic fracturing equipment and pumping equipment. Our manufactured products meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.
advantages: Full cycle: from design to installation
